about_the_game:
Professor Doctor Jetpack is a physics based lunar lander game, in which you embark on a dangerous journey to ... control your jetpack. Also to save the world, of course.

PREVIEW DEMO: This demo is a preview of the final game with limited levels and reduced functionalities. The game is still in development and all parts might be subject to change!



Explore an intricate cave system with over 80 handcrafted levels, riddled with deadly traps and enemies, while trying to master the gasoline filled, jet powered deathtrap strapped to your back. How far can you make it? Will you be able to save the world from its greatest threat lurking in the heart of our planet?



· Atmospheric retro pixel art on steroids
· DEMO: 22 handcrafted level, with ever increasing difficulty
· DEMO: 1 unique and challenging world boss that will put your skills to the test
· Fun to learn and hard to master
· Unmatched sense of achievement
· Casual mode: Jetpack with "training wheels"

  • Processor: Intel i5+
  • Memory: 600 MB RAM
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

  • OS: Rofl
  • Processor: Intel i5+
  • Memory: 600 MB RAM
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
